section.simpara: Counts the number of participants in a MeetMe conference.
Announces the number of participants in the conference. If the variable name is provided, the announcement is skipped and the count written to this variable.
section.programlisting: ; die Teilnehmerzahl der Konferenz 333 in ${anzahl} speichern: exten => 333,1,MeetMeCount(123,anzahl)

formalpara.title: Internal help for this application in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'MeetMeCount' =-
[Synopsis] MeetMe participant count
[Description] MeetMeCount(confno[|var]): Plays back the number of users in the specified MeetMe conference. If var is specified, playback will be skipped and the value will be returned in the variable. Upon app completion, MeetMeCount will hangup the channel, unless priority n+1 exists, in which case priority progress will continue. A ZAPTEL INTERFACE MUST BE INSTALLED FOR CONFERENCING FUNCTIONALITY.
